name: MarshSounds
0:
”Alexa open Marsh Sounds”
”Alexa ask Marsh Sounds to play for 8 hours”
”Alexa, pause”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: marsh sounds
des:
Immerse yourself in the tranquil sounds of the marshlands with Marsh Sounds. This Alexa Skill brings the peaceful ambiance of marshes right into your home, offering a natural escape to those who find solace in the sounds of nature. Whether you're seeking relaxation, a backdrop for meditation, or a serene soundscape to fall asleep to, Marsh Sounds provides a rich tapestry of sounds that will transport you to a world of calm.

1. On Alexa app, navigate to Routines.
2. Click + to add a new routine.
3. Click + for "When this happens" and choose one.
4. Click + for "Add action" and choose "Skills".
5. Choose "Your Skills" and select Marsh Sounds
6. Choose Device to perform the routine and save.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
